name: table
description: This library provides generic functions for table manipulation. It provides all its functions inside the table `table`.

parameters.name: tbl
parameters.description: The table to insert the variable into.

parameters.name: position
parameters.description: The position in the table to insert the variable. If the third argument is nil this argument becomes the value to insert at the end of given table.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The variable to insert into the table.

parameters.name: sorter
parameters.description:
If specified, the function will be called with 2 parameters each.
Return true in this function if you want the first parameter to come first in the sorted array.

parameters.name: sourceTbl
parameters.description: The source table from which the elements are to be moved.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The start index of the source range from which the elements are to be moved.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The end index of the source range until which the elements are to be moved.

parameters.name: dest
parameters.description: The index within the destination table where the moved elements should be inserted. If this is not specified, the moved elements will be inserted at the end of the table.

parameters.name: destTbl
parameters.description: The destination table to which the elements are to be moved. By default, this is the same as the source table.

parameters.name: tbl
parameters.description: The table to remove the value from.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The index of the value to remove.

parameters.name: concatenator
parameters.description: A separator to insert between strings
